comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The Ogden standard. (Ogden City, Utah), 01 Feb. 1916. page 1 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn85058396/1916-02-01/ed-... describes an incident of a British liner, the Appam, being taken by the Germans off Africa and brought to Newport News. According to the article above, Francis Charles Fuller, "who was appointed [British] Chief Commissioner of Ashanti in 1905" had been booked on the passage.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
